author: frozenfire.eth
content:
Does anyone know of a ZK-friendly encryption scheme which has the property that a public key can be used to encrypt a message into a succinct output, such that the holder of the private key can recover enough of the original message to find that message within a set of known messages?

But, knowing the set of known messages and the public key must not be itself enough (through brute force) to know which message the encrypted message corresponds to.
